statements: SELECT * FROM legislative_records;
SELECT bill_number, bill_title FROM legislative_records WHERE bill_status = 'Pending';
SELECT bill_title, sponsor_name FROM legislative_records WHERE bill_status = 'Approved';
SELECT sponsor_name, bill_title FROM legislative_records ORDER BY sponsor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_records WHERE bill_number BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM legislative_records WHERE bill_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY sponsor_name DESC;
SELECT bill_title, sponsor_name FROM legislative_records WHERE bill_number > 100 ORDER BY bill_title ASC;
SELECT bill_number, bill_title, sponsor_name FROM legislative_records WHERE sponsor_name LIKE 'J%' AND bill_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY bill_number ASC;
SELECT record_id, bill_title, bill_status FROM legislative_records WHERE bill_status = 'Passed' AND sponsor_name = 'Alice Smith' ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_records WHERE bill_status = 'Rejected' AND sponsor_name = 'Bob Johnson' ORDER BY bill_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE bill_id = 1;
SELECT bill_name, proposed_date FROM bills WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT resolution_name, passed_date FROM resolutions ORDER BY passed_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM bills JOIN resolutions ON bills.bill_id = resolutions.resolution_id;
SELECT bill_name, proposed_date, status FROM bills WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE status='pending' ORDER BY proposed_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT bill_name, proposed_date, status FROM bills WHERE bill_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY bill_name ASC;
SELECT bill_name, proposed_date, resolved_by FROM bills JOIN resolutions ON bills.bill_id=resolutions.resolution_id WHERE resolutions.passed_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bills FROM bills;
SELECT bill_name, status, COUNT(*), AVG(bill_id) FROM bills GROUP BY bill_name, status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY AVG(bill_id) DESC;
SELECT * FROM Bills;
SELECT introduction_date, bill_title FROM Bills WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT resolution_number, resolution_title, passed FROM Resolutions WHERE vote_date='2022-10-15';
SELECT last_name, party FROM Legislators WHERE district='ABC';
SELECT bill_number, introduced_date, status FROM Bills WHERE bill_id=1001;
SELECT * FROM Bills WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT bill_title, bill_number FROM Bills ORDER BY introduced_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Legislators WHERE party = 'Democratic' AND district = 'NY-01';
SELECT bill_title, bill_number, introduced_date FROM Bills WHERE introduced_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT resolution_title, passed FROM Resolutions WHERE vote_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM bills;
SELECT bill_title, status FROM bills WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT sponsor, introduction_date, last_action_date FROM bills WHERE introduction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM resolutions ORDER BY resolution_id DESC;
SELECT committee_name, chair, members FROM committees WHERE members > 5;
SELECT bill_title, status, introduction_date FROM bills;
SELECT resolution_title, sponsor, status, last_action_date FROM resolutions ORDER BY last_action_date DESC;
SELECT sponsor, introduction_date FROM bills WHERE status = 'Pending' AND introduction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT committee_name, chair, members FROM committees WHERE members > 5 ORDER BY members DESC;
SELECT voter_name, vote_decision FROM votes WHERE vote_decision = 'Yes' OR vote_decision = 'No';
SELECT * FROM bills;
SELECT bill_title, introduction_date FROM bills WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM resolutions WHERE status = 'Passed';
SELECT sponsor, count(*) FROM bills GROUP BY sponsor;
SELECT first_name, last_name, party FROM legislators WHERE district = 'ABC';
SELECT * FROM bills WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT bill_title, sponsor, introduction_date FROM bills ORDER BY introduction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM resolutions WHERE status IN ('passed', 'failed');
SELECT legislator_id, first_name, last_name FROM legislators WHERE party = 'Democratic' AND district = 'NY';
SELECT committee_name, member_count FROM committees ORDER BY member_count DESC;
